org.openimaj.knn

Class FloatNearestNeighbours

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.knn.FloatNearestNeighbours
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NearestNeighbours<float[],float[],IntFloatPair>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FloatADCNearestNeighbours, FloatNearestNeighboursExact, FloatNearestNeighboursKDTree, IncrementalFloatADCNearestNeighbours

    public abstract class FloatNearestNeighbours
extends Object
implements NearestNeighbours<float[],float[],IntFloatPair>
    Abstract base class for k-nearest-neighbour calculations with float[] data.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk), Sina Samangooei (ss@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Method Detail

      • distanceFunc

        public static void distanceFunc(float[] qu,
                                float[][] pnts,
                                float[] dsq_out)
        Static method to find the sum-squared distance between a query vector and each of a set of points. Results are stored in the dsq_out array, much must have the same length as the number of points.
        Parameters:
        qu - The query vector.
        pnts - The points to compare against.
        dsq_out - The resultant distances.

      • distanceFunc

        public static float distanceFunc(float[] qu,
                                 float[] pnt)
        Static method to find the sum-squared distance between a query vector and a point.
        Parameters:
        qu - The query vector.
        pnt - The point to compare against.
        Returns:
        The resultant distance.

      • distanceFunc

        public static float distanceFunc(FloatFVComparator distance,
                                 float[] qu,
                                 float[] pnt)
        Static method to find a distance between a query vector and a point.
        Parameters:
        distance - the distance measure
        qu - The query vector.
        pnt - The point to compare against.
        Returns:
        The resultant distance.

      • distanceFunc

        public static void distanceFunc(FloatFVComparator distance,
                                float[] qu,
                                float[][] pnts,
                                float[] dsq_out)
        Static method to find a distance between a query vector and each of a set of points. Results are stored in the dsq_out array, much must have the same length as the number of points.
        Parameters:
        distance - the distance measure
        qu - The query vector.
        pnts - The points to compare against.
        dsq_out - The resultant distances.
